text: Jin to ningen no katagata yo, anata gata no ma kara kozora reta shito-tachi ga, anata gata no moto ni kite, waga shirushi o anata gata no moto ni fukushō shi, anata gata no kono Ni~Tsu no kaiken ni tsuite, keikoku shinakatta no ka.' Kare-ra wa mōshiagerudearou. `Watashi-tachi wa, jibun no i ni hanshi shōgen itashimasu.' Hontōni gense no seikatsu ga kare-ra o kan wase, jibun ga fushin-shadeatta koto o, jibun no i ni hanshite shōgen suru
